param.name: state_folders
param.dialogReference:
The state or region folder containing the "archydro" and/or "bc_layers" folders, usually existing within the "data" folder.

The folder name must consist only of a state abbreviation for one of the 50 United States, the District of Columbia (DC), the Colorado River Basin (CRB), the Deleware River Basin (DRB) or the Rainy River Basin (RRB).

param.name: copy_data_archydro
param.dialogReference: When checked, the "archydro" folder found within the state/region folder will be copied to S3.

param.name: copy_data_bc_layers
param.dialogReference: When checked, the "bc_layers" folder found within the state/region folder will be copied to S3.

param.name: xml_files
param.dialogReference: The state/region ".xml" file, whose name should contain "StreamStats" plus the state/region abbreviation.

param.name: schema_files
param.displayname: Select input schema FGDB or PRJ file
param.dialogReference: The input schema, in either a .fgdb or a .prj file.
